version_description: We have fixed the Spell issue that some of you have experienced since our last update. We thank you for your patience and support.
We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience. Thanks for playing, and keep popping those pigs!

- NEW HATS! Have a Pirate party, go to the Beach, or look cool in School!
- KING PIG PANIC: For Daily Challenge Pros! Beat these levels to win even bigger rewards!
- PIG BEHAVIOR: Rule breakers have been disciplined!
- NEW PIGS ON THE BLOCK: Watch out for towers and beams!
- NEW CHAPTERS: The Hamazonas & Copacabacon!

TRICK or TREAT? Limited time unnervingly spooky levels and special offers!
• FEATHER FRENZY! We are giving away more feathers than ever. Go grab them in Chests, Daily Challenges and Arena!
• BIRD POWER! Do you have what it takes? Visit the hat shop in the Arena to find out more
• MORE HATS! Get Spooky, Go Medieval or try a Wig!
• NEW CHAPTERS, NEW CARD TIER, and more
• HAVE A SPOOKTACULAR HAM’O’WEEN!

Angry Birds 2, Apple and (RED) are working together to help create an AIDS-free generation with Games for (RED).

Your actions matter. From now until December 6th, 100% of the proceeds from your (GEM PILE)RED purchase goes to the Global Fund to support HIV/AIDS prevention, treatment, counseling, and testing in sub-Saharan Africa.

BE A HERO. GET SUPERPOWE(RED).
– Dress your birds in the free (HERO)RED Mask Set available for a limited time only.
– Use the special FEATHE(RED) FLURRY spell.
– Support the fight against AIDS with a purchase of the (GEM PILE)RED

Games for (RED) comes to an end. A huge thank you to everyone who masked up for the campaign, everyone who dropped the FEATHE(RED) FLURRY spell, and of course everyone who purchased the (GEM PILE)RED to support the fight against AIDS!

Happy Holidays from Angry Birds 2! As the weather gets colder outside, we’ve got a new update fresh from the oven with new levels, wintery hats, and lots more.

– NEW TOWER OF FORTUNE - Great rewards await! Aim high!
– NEW PRISTINE CARD TIER and NEW Slingshot levels!
– NEW HATS! Christmas, Winter and Fancy styles.
– 80 NEW LEVELS in the Pigfoot Mountains and Central Pork areas!

– NEW HOME SCREEN! We've moved things around to improve clarity and accessibility.
– IMPROVED DAILY QUESTS: Play a quest directly from the menu and collect big rewards for completing all of them.
– IMPROVED TREASURES: With bigger and better rewards!
– NEW HATS! Valentine, Wizard and Steampunk
– NEW EPIC CARD TIER and NEW Slingshot levels!
– 80 NEW LEVELS in the Hamsterdam and Mississpiggy River chapters!

- IMPROVEMENTS! Silver (the bird) and Blizzard (the spell) now deal more damage.
- NEW TREASURES! Common, Rare and Legendary chests now grant even better rewards.
- BONUS SYSTEM! Earn points and collect fantastic rewards in the Bonus shop.
- NEW HAT SETS! Easter, Work, and Mythic.
- NEW EPIC CARD AND SLINGSHOT LEVELS! Said it all in the caps really...
- 80 NEW LEVELS! Play the new Boarneo and Got Ham City chapters.

FEATS! Earn great rewards for your accomplishments!
NEW HAT SETS! Fruitshades, Sports and Pharoah.
NEW ANCIENT CARD TIER and NEW SLINGSHOT levels!
80 NEW LEVELS! Play the new Twin Beaks and Hog Warts chapters.

HAPPY BIRDDAY! We just turned 2 and are celebrating it with the release of CLANS! Now you can play with millions of fans worldwide!

- Assemble your own mighty clan, or join a ferocious one
- Collaborate in limited time events for the biggest loot
- Sizzle some bacon in all new volcano levels
- Chat with your Clan mates
- Show off your flock power

And more!

- HAT SETS - Birthday, Chef and Ice Cream
- ANCIENT Card levels and SLINGSHOT levels
- NEW Chapters - Piggymanjaro and Porkyo with 80 levels
- Bug fixes and improvements
We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience. Thanks for playing, and keep popping those pigs!

A big Halloween treat comes to Angry Birds 2: NEW Clan Battles! Go head-to-head with other clans in timed events and fill your goodie bag with sweet rewards.
– NEW CLAN BATTLES.
– NEW Hats! 2 new hat sets: Jester & Spooky.
– Halloween sales!
– 40 NEW levels in 2 NEW areas.
– NEW Bird Card tiers.

A big Halloween treat comes to Angry Birds 2: NEW Clan Battles! Go head-to-head with other clans in timed events and fill your goodie bag with sweet rewards.
– NEW CLAN BATTLES.
– NEW Hats! 2 new hat sets: Jester & Spooky.
– Halloween sales!
– 40 NEW levels in 2 NEW areas.
– NEW Bird Card tiers.

The holidays are here! Unwrap a big ol’ update featuring a new way to compete with the top players in the world.
– Mighty Eagle’s Boot Camp: Compete for a top spot on the global leader board in an infinite level every day!
– 2 NEW Chapters: Play 80 new levels in Porka Pica and the United Steaks of Hamerica.
– NEW Viking Hat Set – available soon!

The holidays are here! Unwrap a big ol’ update featuring a new way to compete with the top players in the world.
– Mighty Eagle’s Boot Camp: Compete for a top spot on the global leader board in an infinite level every day!
– 2 NEW Chapters: Play 80 new levels in Porka Pica and the United Steaks of Hamerica.
– NEW Viking Hat Set – available soon!
We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience. Thanks for playing, and keep popping those pigs!

Super Bowl LII is just around the corner, and the birds of Angry Birds 2 are gearing up for the big game! Choose your favorite NFL team, and collect a NEW set of hats and helmets in your team’s colors.
– NEW hat set featuring your favorite NFL team.
– Fantastic other bird stuff!

The Mighty Eagle’s Shop – the only place to get rainbow feathers, animated avatars, and the powerful Samurai hat set. The shop opens at the end of the Bootcamp season – coming soon!

– NEW RAINBOW FEATHERS: Choose which bird to give feathers to.
– NEW Stone Age & Samurai hat sets.
– 40 NEW levels in Oinktario and Hamtarctica.
– Valentine’s day offers and more – stay tuned!

NEW Clan Chests: Share a chest full of loot with your clanmates!

Plus:
– Earn double the feathers in the FEATHER FRENZY EVENT!
– Compete for a spot in the top 100 on the Clan Leaderboard.
– Level up your slingshots EVEN HIGHER.
– Play 80 NEW levels

Show off your world class skills in the new Legendary League. Tougher competition, longer win streaks, and bigger rewards!
– NEW Legendary League in the Arena for the best of the best.
– Super Streak Event: Get a taste of the Legendary League’s longer win streaks for a limited time. Coming soon!

NEW Clan Chests: Share a chest full of loot with your clanmates!

Plus:

– Compete for a spot in the top 100 on the Clan Leaderboard.
– Level up your slingshots EVEN HIGHER.
– Play 80 NEW levels

Adopt your own adorable Hatchling pet! Take good care of your cute new friend, and they'll give your flock a boost.
– NEW Hatchling pets!
– Visit the Tower of Fortune for a chance to crack open the NEW Jackpot Egg full of good stuff!
– 80 NEW levels in 2 new areas, featuring 6 boss piggies.
– 2 NEW hat sets.

New Hat Event and Black Pearl Event coming soon – check back so you don't miss a thing!
– Hat Events: Wear the right hats to access special event levels and earn rewards for a limited time.
– Black Pearl Party: Get double Black Pearl rewards for a limited time.
– NEW Levels: 80 new levels in 2 new areas.
– NEW Hat Set!

Get ready for a new round of fresh levels, hats, and events!
– New levels! Play 80 new levels in 2 new areas.
– New hats & Hat Events! Earn new hats in the Tower of Fortune, and put them to use in hat events!
– New Ancient Slingshot levels!
– Stay up to date on all Angry Birds 2 events, giveaways and other happenings at facebook.com/angrybirds2

It’s cold out there! Why not chill inside with a wintery new update.
New hat event! Play the Tower of Fortune to win the new Present hat set and participate in the Present Adventure!

Celebrate the Angry Birds 10 Year Anniversary with two limited time events:
– New hat event! Play the Tower of Fortune December 12-19 and win new hats inspired by the classic Angry Birds design! Gear up in the new hats and participate to the 10th Anniversary Adventure!
– New Classic Adventure! Play 10 hand picked classic Angry Birds levels! Classic levels, classic music, and classic gameplay, all with the look and physics of Angry Birds 2.
Minor fixes and improvements. Just cleaning up around the nest.

Get ready for The Angry Birds Movie 2 with a batch of events inspired by the movie!
– New hats – The birds and pigs are joining forces. show your team spirit with a new set of Pig Hats!
– New hat event – Wear your new hat to take part in The Snouty Adventure.
– Zeta, the icy villain of The Angry Birds Movie 2 comes to Angry Birds 2 as a boss!

– New Extra Bird coming soon! Get pumped up for a new guest in the nest.
– You can now check the activity of clan members. See who’s active and who is slacking behind.
– New LEGENDARY slingshot tier.
– Other minor bug fixes and improvements.

– New event! Extra Bird Fever – Extra Birds get EXTRA powerful for a limited time.
– Duplicate hats in Hat Events now give temporary bonuses.
– Other minor improvements and fixes.

– New daily reward in Mighty Eagle’s Bootcamp – Play and earn coins every day!
– Now you can revive your fallen Hatchling in Jetpack Run to fly even further!
– Other minor improvements and fixes.

– Other minor improvements and fixes.

– New daily reward in Mighty Eagle’s Bootcamp – Play and earn coins every day!
– Now you can revive your fallen Hatchling in Jetpack Run to fly even further!
– Other minor improvements and fixes.

New event! The Hatchlings are learning to fly – with jetpacks! Pilot your Hatchling through a tricky aerial obstacle course to collect apples, and nab the highest score against players around the world.
Also coming soon: Rainbow Rave! All feather rewards become Rainbow Feathers for a limited time. Use them to level up your favorite bird!

– 2 New chapters with new levels.
– Minor fixes. Just pecking at a few bugs. Delicious!

– Welcome a new member to your flock! Who could it be?
– Feather Bonus: Level up your birds to get it!
– You can now buy Football hats!
– We've replaced Daily Feathers for Feather Bonus.

This year, a very special bird returns to the flock as a new playable character for the first time in Angry Birds 2! Who is coming home for the holidays?
– New extra bird!
– New hats!
– New events!
– 2 New chapters with new levels.
– New and improved Hat Shop.

Get ready for The Angry Birds Movie 2 with a batch of events inspired by the movie!
– New hats – The birds and pigs are joining forces. show your team spirit with a new set of Pig Hats!
– New hat event – Wear your new hat to take part in The Snouty Adventure.
– Zeta, the icy villain of The Angry Birds Movie 2 comes to Angry Birds 2 as a boss!

The flock is getting ready for The Angry Birds Movie 2.
- Enemies become frenemies. For the first time ever, a pig is joining the flock as a playable character! Unlock Leonard as an "Extra Bird" and defeat Zeta, the icy villain from the movie!
- New hat event. Brrr - It’s cold on Eagle Island! Collect the winter gear featured in the movie to play a special hat event.
Minor fixes and improvements. Just cleaning up around the nest.

– NEW! Rowdy Rumble Tournament – Sign up for a limited-time tournament and duel your way to the top against other players!
– NEW! Daily Challenge Streak – win consecutive daily challenges without any failures to earn extra rewards!

– NEW! Rowdy Rumble Tournament – Sign up for a limited-time tournament and duel your way to the top against other players!
– NEW! Daily Challenge Streak – Win consecutive daily challenges without any failures to earn extra rewards!

Play the Angry Birds 2 Bring The Anger event starting November 12th!
Once we reach 10 billion pigs popped, that piggy-popping anger will be converted into a $100k donation that will help bring education to displaced children around the world. Pop piggies and show your support!

Celebrate the Angry Birds 10 Year Anniversary with two limited time events:
– New hat event! Play the Tower of Fortune December 11-21 and win new hats inspired by the classic Angry Birds design! Gear up in the new hats and participate to the 10th Anniversary Adventure!
– New Classic Adventure! Play 10 hand picked classic Angry Birds levels! Classic levels, classic music, and classic gameplay, all with the look and physics of Angry Birds 2.

– New Hat Event! The birds have a New Year’s resolution to get in shape. Collect a new set of Aerobics hats and get them geared up to work out!
– Improved Clan Battle scoring – Now eggs will be allocated based on score, not on position in the leaderboard.

- New hat event! It’s the least angry time of the year – Valentine’s Day! But that doesn’t mean the birds are sitting this one out. Collect a fetching new set of Cupid Hats and enter The Adventure of Love!
- All-new event type! Compete in groups of 50 players to complete an objective. In this update, it’s a race to collect as many stars as possible!
- New Mighty Eagle Local Leaderboard - Compete against evenly matched players in Mighty Eagle's Bootcamp to earn great rewards!
- New rewards! Collect Free Birds Tokens, Tower of Fortune Tickets, and Express Tickets!

– The birds go above and beyond in a new Interstellar Adventure! Collect the new Cosmic Hat Set in the Tower of Fortune and blast off into the unknown!

– Easter is here! Celebrate the eggiest time of the year with a new Easter hat set and an Easter Adventure!
– NEW! Personalize your flock with whatever hats you want! The highest power among your hats will always be in effect.

– New! Earn extra cards to use in Mighty Eagle’s Bootcamp by completing the Daily Challenge and King Pig Panic!
– New hat event! Play the Tower of Fortune to win the new Musketeer hat set and embark on The Brave Adventure!

NEW Event Shop! Collect new event-specific currency during limited time events and trade it in for valuable items in the all new Event Shop. The selection in the Event Shop will change for every new event so be sure to check in to see what’s on offer!

NEW Event Shop! Collect new event-specific currency during limited time events and trade it in for valuable items in the all new Event Shop. The selection in the Event Shop will change for every new event so be sure to check in to see what’s on offer!

Celebrate our 5th Anniversary with a Fan-Tastic Hat Event!
Play the Tower of Fortune from July 30 to August 8 and win new hats designed by the Angry Birds 2 community! Gear up with the new hats and join Fan-Tastic Adventure.

Coming Soon: Hat Evolution! Now upgrade your event hats for a boost in Flock Power and fabulousness! The power boost lasts for the duration of the event, but the new hat style is permanent. Customize your flock with upgraded and extra fashionable hats!

Participate in Angry Birds 2 Playing for the Planet events starting October 12th!
– Pop piggies to win exciting rewards and learn more about reforestation and how to contribute to reforestation efforts!
– Collect the new Park Ranger Hat Set and embark on The Lost In The Woods Adventure.

Let’s play for the planet!

New Hat Evolution Event! Collect the new Calavera hats and their upgrades from Tower of Fortune or the event shop and participate in ¡Aventura Colorida! Customize your flock with upgraded and extra fashionable hats!
New Hat Event! Collect the new Rococo Hat Set and embark on The Ornate Adventure.

All-new Arena Gameplay!
– New Matchmaking: Opponents selected based on your own Arena Ranking and league!
– Instant Promotion: No more waiting a week to climb the leagues!
– More Rewards: New seasonal, streak, and weekly rewards up for grabs!
– Flock of the Day: You can only take 5 birds into a match!
– New Master League: Are you a top player? Prove it by reaching our new exclusive Master League!

New Hat Event!
– Collect the new Christmas Carol Hat Set and join the Christmas Adventure.

– Flock of the Day: You can only take 5 birds into a match!
– New Master League: Are you a top player? Prove it by reaching our new exclusive Master League!

Turn it up to 11 – it’s time to rock out in a brand new hat event! Collect the new Rock Band hat set and take part in the Sweet Child o’ Swine Adventure!

Get ready for an extra dramatic new update! Collect a new Kabuki hat set and take it to the stage in the Theater Road Adventure!
– New Kabuki Hat Set
– New Theater Road Hat Adventure
– NEW! Collect all tier 2 and tier 3 hat evolutions for a set to earn a boost to your slingshot power!

It’s Easter, and that can only mean one thing – time for a cracking new hat adventure! Collect the new Easter Craft hat set and take part in The Eggcellent Adventure. Check the shop every day for a new deal and a chance to trade items!
– New Eggcellent Adventure!
– New Easter Craft hat set!
– New in the shop: Daily deals!
Get ready for an update that hits all the high notes! Collect the all new Troubadour Hat Set in the Tower of Fortune and get tuned up for the new Minstrel Adventure!
Get ready for an update that hits all the high notes! Collect the all new Troubadour Hat Set in the Tower of Fortune and get tuned up for the new Troubadour Adventure!
New! Mighty Hat Evolutions are now available in the Hat Shop for Black Pearls. Collect all the Tier 1 and 2 Evolutions to power up your slingshot! Test it out first on the Samurai hat set!
